function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal access to green space may lead to unequal recreational opportunities and potential conflicts of interest.","Impact":"Limited access to green space may lead to reduced physical and mental health benefits for some groups, as well as potential social tensions and conflicts.","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of green space, inclusive design and management, and community engagement in local planning processes.","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, geographic information systems (GIS) for spatial analysis, urban planning software for inclusive design.","People":"Residents living in neighborhoods with limited access to green space, different social groups with varying recreational needs, local authorities responsible for urban planning and management.","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners, community organizations."}]}
